channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
channel.description:
The Trapper Neutral killing; unique
**Innovative**: (passive) Immune to death on nights in which you do not use _enable traps_. You will still be immune to death if you attempt to do so and then are occupied.
Night ability one: **set trap** (infinite uses) Place a trap at your target’s door.
Night ability two: **enable traps** (infinite uses, one-day cool down) Enable all traps (set by set trap) anyone who has a trap at their door and leaves their room will die; anyone who visits someone with a trap at their door will die; the latter does not disable the trap’s future use.
Day ability one: **Nightshade dispenser** (2 uses) If your target uses a day ability today, they will be poisoned with nightshade (timing same as assassin’s nightshade ability)
Day ability two: **Efficient killing** (1 use) If you use _set trap_ tonight, it will bypass death immunity
Goal: **Kill all who would oppose innovation! (blue dragon, cult, unseen, non-engineer neutral killers)**
Lore:WIP (leave suggestions in the comments, if you'd like; I will place you in "credits")
credits: name "trapper" from @Ami

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

Fist

lol.

RopeStringFace:

Lastly, I said this because otherwise the trapper cannot kill the psychic.

Observer doesn’t see Psychic links/visions. Why should “Trapper” be different?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

This makes it weak for a Neutral Killer. RB+Attack=Dead

Do you think it should be night immune every night? If so, I would trust your judgement and change it.

ThePlex:

Psychic never leaves their room using their abilities. This also would not be changed at all because it would affect the entire game.

Fist of all, i said for the purpose of traps, not in any other circumstances. I can see the flaw in this now, but I think it is an exaggeration to say it will affect the entire game. Lastly, I said this because otherwise the trapper cannot kill the psychic.

I will make said adjustments now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

Additional notes: Psychic’s vision counts as leaving their room for the purpose of dying to traps;

Psychic never leaves their room using their abilities. This also would not be changed at all because it would affect the entire game.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Also, if you NEED an explanation, plex:

The traps require a lot of energy (they are fire traps, and this is the medieval times). This is shown in that the trapper has a one-day cool-down on activating traps. He is so eager to kill that he never considered activating them in the morning, because he shortsightedly thought that people would see his targets meet their demise, and discover his presence.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Cause why would a knight betray their ruler? It would make them seem like a traitor

And yet he can accuse him off treason…

ThePlex:

The prince is suppose to be the king’s son technically, why would he jail his father?

Then why is the prince blue dragon when the king is evil?

ThePlex:

Targets hide their journals

then how do the members of the court find it?[quote=“ThePlex, post:41, topic:2196”]
Window peak Not Window watch
[/quote]

They can’t see something as obvious as an attempted murder, but can make out an identity?

ThePlex:

Butler technically doesn’t have a Room, he’s out serving wine and cleaning etc.

you pulled that out of your hat, didn’t you?

additions to the list:
-observer can window peak a player and figure out who visited them, because no one wears a mask (even though assassin’s art shows a mask, and reaper’s art shows no face because of long hood)
-Seeing as observer can make out faces, why can’t players who attacked yet survived make out their assailant?

By the way, I’m not criticizing the game’s unrealistic aspects; I am merely pointing out them so plex can see that his criticism of this class for being unrealistic is silly.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

I wonder why the knight cannot attack the king, and the prince cannot jail him either…

Cause why would a knight betray their ruler? It would make them seem like a traitor
The prince is suppose to be the king’s son technically, why would he jail his father?

RopeStringFace:

-killers do not steal their target’s journals

Targets hide their journals

RopeStringFace:

-the observer does not observe what people do to each other; he seems to drop from the window as soon as they enter the room.

Window peak Not Window watch

RopeStringFace:

-the butler can’t be frozen by the wizard, even though the butler has no magic

Butler technically doesn’t have a Room, he’s out serving wine and cleaning etc.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Trapper
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Everyone has to leave their room to go to the Court table.

I wonder why the knight cannot attack the king, and the prince cannot jail him either…

OH YEAH!

balance.

Clearly, since the traps are enabled, they are only enabled at night, not early morning, when people leave their rooms.

More physical limitations that don’t make sense:
-killers do not steal their target’s journals
-the butler can’t be frozen by the wizard, even though the butler has no magic
-the observer does not observe what people do to each other; he seems to drop from the window as soon as they enter the room.

Read full topic
